editor: Kokoroko?
raw: https://e-hentai.org/g/506796/469849b004/

A day of fun in the sun, but more for the mermen monsters than for the lovely ladies. No complicated stories here, just nice art!

We are always recruiting editors, translators, and proofreaders for EHCOVE. If you are interested, come by the Cove of Translators in the forums and introduce yourself. Or shoot me a PM/DM, since we're mostly on Discord these days.

If you want to see more awesome content support bounties at https://e-hentai.org/bounty.php?search=EHCOVE&t=&s=
n: [Artist CG] [Oninoe] Hi no Shita de | Under the Sun [English] [EHCOVE]
